languages.text: "Нет. Ересь — это то, во что верите вы и ваши присные кровопийцы. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Экклезиархия{/g} обратила веру в кнут, коим погоняет бесправных. Аристократия — в щит, оправдывающий их прегрешения. Блюстители — в дубинку, коей побивают осмелившихся возвысить голос. Ваша вера — инструмент лжи и подавления, и я отрекся от нее давно. Моя вера обещает спасение, а не рабство".

"No. Heresy is what you and your fellow bloodsuckers believe in. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} has turned faith into a whip to drive the powerless, the aristocracy has turned it into a shield to cover their transgressions, and the enforcers have turned it into a club with which to beat those who dare to raise their voices. Your faith is an instrument of lies and suppression, and I renounced it long ago. My faith promises salvation, not thraldom."
languages.original_text: "Нет. Ересь — это то, во что верите вы и ваши присные кровопийцы. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Экклезиархия{/g} обратила веру в кнут, коим погоняет бесправных. Моя вера обещает спасение, а не рабство".

traits.locale_text: "No. Heresy is what you and your fellow bloodsuckers believe in. The Ecclesiarchy has turned faith into a whip to drive the powerless. The aristocracy has turned it into a shield to cover their transgressions. The enforcers have turned it into a club with which to beat those who dare to raise their voices. Your faith is an instrument of lies and suppression, and I renounced it long ago. My faith promises salvation, not slavery."

languages.text: "Nein. Ketzerei ist etwas, woran Ihr und Eure Blutsauger glaubt. Die {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekklesiarchie{/g} hat den Glauben in eine Peitsche verwandelt, um die Machtlosen anzutreiben, die Aristokratie hat daraus einen Schild gemacht, um ihre Vergehen zu verbergen, und die Enforcer haben daraus eine Keule gemacht, mit der sie alle erschlagen, die es wagen, ihre Stimme zu erheben. Euer Glaube ist ein Werkzeug für Lügen und Unterdrückung, und ich habe mich vor langer Zeit davon losgesagt. Mein Glaube verspricht Erlösung, nicht Knechtschaft."
languages.original_text: "No. Heresy is what you and your fellow bloodsuckers believe in. Your faith is an instrument of lies and suppression, and I renounced it long ago. My faith promises salvation, not thraldom."

languages.text: «No. Herejía es lo que creen usted y las sanguijuelas que le siguen. La {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Eclesiarquía{/g} ha convertido la fe en un látigo con el que fustiga a los indefensos, la aristocracia la utiliza como escudo para encubrir sus transgresiones y los guardias la empuñan cual garrote para golpear a quienes osan levantar la voz. Su fe es un instrumento de mentiras y supresión, y yo renuncié a ella hace mucho tiempo. Mi fe promete la salvación, no la sumisión».
languages.original_text: "No. Heresy is what you and your fellow bloodsuckers believe in. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} has turned faith into a whip to drive the powerless, the aristocracy has turned it into a shield to cover their transgressions, and the enforcers have turned it into a club with which to beat those who dare to raise their voices. Your faith is an instrument of lies and suppression, and I renounced it long ago. My faith promises salvation, not thraldom."

traits.locale_text: «No. Herejía es lo que creen usted y las sanguijuelas que le siguen. La Eclesiarquía ha convertido la fe en un látigo con el que fustiga a los indefensos, la aristocracia la utiliza como escudo para encubrir sus transgresiones y los guardias la empuñan cual garrote para golpear a quienes osan levantar la voz. Su fe es un instrumento de mentiras y supresión, y yo renuncié a ella hace mucho tiempo. Mi fe promete la salvación, no la sumisión».

languages.text: 「異端とは、あなたたち血を欲する者達が信じるものだろう。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}帝国聖教会{/g}は信仰を無力な者を駆り立てる鞭に変え、貴族は自分たちの罪を隠す盾に変え、エンフォーサーたちは声を上げる勇気のある者を叩くこん棒に変えた。あなた達の信仰は嘘と弾圧の道具であり、私はとうの昔にそれを捨てたのだ。私の信仰は救いを約束するものであり、束縛を約束するものではない」
languages.original_text: "No. Heresy is what you and your fellow bloodsuckers believe in. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} has turned faith into a whip to drive the powerless, the aristocracy has turned it into a shield to cover their transgressions, and the enforcers have turned it into a club with which to beat those who dare to raise their voices. Your faith is an instrument of lies and suppression, and I renounced it long ago. My faith promises salvation, not thraldom."

traits.locale_text: 「異端とは、あなたたち血を欲する者達が信じるものだろう。帝国聖教会は信仰を無力な者を駆り立てる鞭に変え、貴族は自分たちの罪を隠す盾に変え、エンフォーサーたちは声を上げる勇気のある者を叩くこん棒に変えた。あなた達の信仰は嘘と弾圧の道具であり、私はとうの昔にそれを捨てたのだ。私の信仰は救いを約束するものであり、束縛を約束するものではない」

「異端とは、あなたたち血を欲する者達が信じるものだろう。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}帝国聖教会{/g}は信仰を無力な者を駆り立てる鞭に変え、貴族は自分たちの罪を隠す盾に変え、エンフォーサーたちは声を上げる勇気のある者を叩くこん棒に変えた。あなた達の信仰は嘘と弾圧の道具であり、私はとうの昔にそれを捨てたのだ。私の信仰は救いを約束するものであり、束縛を約束するものではない」

languages.text: “并非如此，你们这些吸血鬼才是异端分子。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}国教{/g}把信仰变成了抽打卑贱之人的鞭子，贵族把信仰变成了掩盖罪行的保护伞，而执法者把信仰变成了打击敢于发声之人的棍棒。你的信仰不过是谎言与压迫的工具，我早就放弃了这样的信仰。我的信仰带来的是救赎，而不是奴役。”
languages.original_text: "No. Heresy is what you and your fellow bloodsuckers believe in. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} has turned faith into a whip to drive the powerless, the aristocracy has turned it into a shield to cover their transgressions, and the enforcers have turned it into a club with which to beat those who dare to raise their voices. Your faith is an instrument of lies and suppression, and I renounced it long ago. My faith promises salvation, not thraldom."

traits.locale_text: “并非如此，你们这些吸血鬼才是异端分子。国教把信仰变成了抽打卑贱之人的鞭子，贵族把信仰变成了掩盖罪行的保护伞，而执法者把信仰变成了打击敢于发声之人的棍棒。你的信仰不过是谎言与压迫的工具，我早就放弃了这样的信仰。我的信仰带来的是救赎，而不是奴役。”

languages.text: « Non. L'hérésie n'est autre que ce en quoi vous croyez, vous et vos petits copains esclavagistes. L'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclésiarchie{/g} a transformé la foi en fouet pour faire avancer les masses laborieuses, l'aristocratie en bouclier pour dissimuler ses péchés et les prévôts en matraques pour tabasser ceux qui osent élever la voix. Votre foi est un instrument de mensonges et de répression, et je l'ai reniée il y a bien longtemps. Ma religion à moi est mère de salut, et non pas de servitude. »
languages.original_text: "No. Heresy is what you and your fellow bloodsuckers believe in. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} has turned faith into a whip to drive the powerless, the aristocracy has turned it into a shield to cover their transgressions, and the enforcers have turned it into a club with which to beat those who dare to raise their voices. Your faith is an instrument of lies and suppression, and I renounced it long ago. My faith promises salvation, not thraldom."

Votre foi est un instrument de mensonges et de répression, et je l'ai reniée il y a bien longtemps. Ma religion à moi est mère de salut, et non pas de servitude. »

Votre foi est un instrument de mensonges et de répression, et je l'ai reniée il y a bien longtemps. Ma religion à moi est mère de salut, et non pas de servitude. »

languages.text: "Hayır. Kâfirlik senin ve kan içici takipçilerinin inandığı şeydir. İnanç, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ekleşiarşi{/g} tarafından güçsüz olanları yönlendirmek için bir kırbaca; aristokrasi tarafından suçlarını kapatması için bir kalkana; infazcılar tarafından ise sesini yükseltme cüreti gösterenleri bastırmak için bir sopaya dönüştürülmüştür. Senin inancın yalanlardan ve baskılamalardan oluşan bir gereç ve ben onu uzun zaman önce terk ettim. Benim inancım kurtuluş vadediyor, esaret değil."
languages.original_text: "No. Heresy is what you and your fellow bloodsuckers believe in. The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorumGlossary}Ecclesiarchy{/g} has turned faith into a whip to drive the powerless, the aristocracy has turned it into a shield to cover their transgressions, and the enforcers have turned it into a club with which to beat those who dare to raise their voices. Your faith is an instrument of lies and suppression, and I renounced it long ago. My faith promises salvation, not thraldom."
